mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, USER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CNT, DEL_YN, REG_DATE, ATCH_YN ) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCnt}, #{delYn}, now(), #{atchYn} )
INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT ( COMMENT_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, REG_DT, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{commentId}, #{commentContent}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, now(), #{delYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, ATCH_YN = #{atchYn}, MOD_DATE = now() WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
UPDATE BOARD_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = "N" ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE DEL_YN = "N" AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
